titleStmt.title: A proclamation against the deceitful winding and folding of woolls
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1660-1685 : Charles II)
Charles II, King of England, 1630-1685.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by John Bill and Christopher Barker ...,

notesStmt.note: "Given at our court at Whitehall, the fifth day of February, 1663, in the sixteenth year of our reign."
Reproduction of original in Cambridge University Library.
